Controler

Class SokobanController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controler.SokobanController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class SokobanController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This is THE Controller of our sokoban game, Variables: View,Model,Controller(of command queue),Commands Factory,Server and boolean flag
    Author:
    Sahar Mizrahi and Gal Ezra

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SokobanController()

      Initialize Model and View from out sources, and start the Controller thread
